titleStmt.title: The charge of the court baron
titleStmt.author: Southwark (London, England.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Cawood, prynter to the Quenes Maiestie. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Probably issued with "The articles of lete and court for the lyberties of Southwarke", 1561--STC.
Imperfect; trimmed at head, affecting running title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
